title: iPad Air 5 is great, but here’s why it’s not an M1 iPad Pro replacement
content:
Apple just announced the iPad Air 5. With the M1 chip inside of it and an updated USB-C port, it never looked as “Pro” as now. That said, I’m still not convinced it can replace the M1 iPad Pro as the tablet professional goes – here’s why.

more…

The post iPad Air 5 is great, but here’s why it’s not an M1 iPad Pro replacement appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple just announced the iPad Air 5, but I'm still not convinced it can replace the M1 iPad Pro as the tablet professional goes – here's why.
